title: February 2010 - September 2016 Achievement Unlocked!
body:
I have a personal announcement.
Today I own all of the Champions available. 
6.5 years in the making :') 
Free hugs for reading.

replies.body: Took you 6 and a half years to get all champs ?
shut up its a good achievment
i've been playing since patch 4.8ish and i only have about 6 champs left

the only champ I got with RP  was shen and i've had about 3 mystery gifted by friends/rito

i also only have reksai kled ivern and the sol left to unlock

I think I play too much... Ive been playing for a little over a year and I've already got 90 champs...

Do I need to start playing league less?
Leauge is Love, League is Life.
